short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you are on the Internet and you need to 'cool' down

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Like the time David played a harp and an 'evil spirit' left Saul, Harpy-time will help you to relax/cool down when on the internet.
Press the app's icon and see!
